amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Strategic Environmental Research and Development Program (SERDP) by $10 million offset by a reduction in funds for defense-wide accounts by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to transfer $10,000,000 from Operation and Maintenance to Research, Development, Test and Evaluation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly (VA) amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 241 (Roll no. 495).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Connolly (VA) amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 241 (Roll no. 495).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Connolly (VA).
